doc.field: Papers, Post James W. Beekman, Including Clippings, Church Bulletins, Correspondence, Genealogy, and Obituaries. Includes Invitation to Dinner with President Teddy Roosevelt at the White House in 1902 and Correspondence with Roosevelt.
